00027 // -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00028 // CAIWConsumerBasicsAppUi::ConstructL()
00029 // Symbian 2nd phase constructor can leave.
00030 // -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00031 //
00032 void CAIWConsumerBasicsAppUi::ConstructL()
00033     {
00034     // Initialise app UI with standard value.
00035     BaseConstructL();
00036     
00037     // Create view object
00038     iAppView = CAIWConsumerBasicsAppView::NewL( ClientRect(), *this );
00039     AddToStackL( iAppView );    
00040 
00041     // Create service handler instance.    
00042     iServiceHandler = CAiwServiceHandler::NewL();
00043 
00044     // Attach call UI menu service interest to AIW framework.
00045     TRAPD(err, iServiceHandler->AttachMenuL(R_AIWCONSUMERBASICS_MENU, 
00046         R_AIWCONSUMERBASICS_MENUINTEREST) );
00047     if(!err)
00048         {
00049         iIsAttached = ETrue;        
00050         }
00051     }
00052 // -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00053 // CAIWConsumerBasicsAppUi::CAIWConsumerBasicsAppUi()
00054 // C++ default constructor can NOT contain any code, that might leave.
00055 // -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00056 //
00057 CAIWConsumerBasicsAppUi::CAIWConsumerBasicsAppUi()
00058 : iIsAttached(EFalse)
00059     {
00060     // No implementation required
00061     }
00062 
00063 // -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00064 // CAIWConsumerBasicsAppUi::~CAIWConsumerBasicsAppUi()
00065 // Destructor.
00066 // -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00067 //
00068 CAIWConsumerBasicsAppUi::~CAIWConsumerBasicsAppUi()
00069     {
00070     delete iServiceHandler;
00071     
00072     if ( iAppView )
00073         {
00074         RemoveFromStack( iAppView );
00075         delete iAppView;
00076         iAppView = NULL;
00077         }
00078     }
00079     
00080 // -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00081 // CAIWConsumerBasicsAppUi::DynInitMenuPaneL()
00082 // 
00083 // -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00084 //    
00085 void CAIWConsumerBasicsAppUi::DynInitMenuPaneL( TInt aResourceId, 
00086     CEikMenuPane *aMenuPane )
00087     {
00088     // First, offer menu pane to AIW framework. It might be the case, that the 
00089     // user is opening an AIW submenu. In this case, the AIW handles the menu.
00090     if ( iServiceHandler->HandleSubmenuL( *aMenuPane ) )
00091         {
00092         return;
00093         }
00094         
00095     // TODO: Add your normal (non-AIW) menu initialisation code here...      
00096 
00097     // Check whether this menu contains AIW menu items.
00098     if ( iServiceHandler->IsAiwMenu(aResourceId) )
00099         {
00100         // Let AIW provider add its menu items to the menu.
00101         iServiceHandler->InitializeMenuPaneL(
00102             *aMenuPane, 
00103             aResourceId, 
00104             EAIWConsumerBasicsCmdLast, 
00105             iServiceHandler->InParamListL());    
00106         }
00107     }
00108 
00109 // -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00110 // CAIWConsumerBasicsAppUi::HandleCommandL()
00111 // Takes care of command handling.
00112 // -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00113 //
00114 void CAIWConsumerBasicsAppUi::HandleCommandL( TInt aCommand )
00115     {
00116     switch( aCommand )
00117         {
00118         case EEikCmdExit:
00119         case EAknSoftkeyExit:
00120             Exit();
00121             break;
00122             
00123         case EAiwAttach:        
00124                    if(!iIsAttached)
00125                         {
00126                         // Attach call UI menu service interest to AIW framework.
00127                         TRAPD(err, iServiceHandler->AttachMenuL(R_AIWCONSUMERBASICS_MENU, 
00128                             R_AIWCONSUMERBASICS_MENUINTEREST) ); 
00129                         if(!err)
00130                             {
00131                             iIsAttached = ETrue;
00132                             }
00133                         }                   
00134                     break;
00135                     
00136         case EAiwDetach:
00137                 if(iIsAttached)
00138                         {
00139                         // Detach all providers from the main menu.            
00140                         iServiceHandler->DetachMenu(R_AIWCONSUMERBASICS_MENU, NULL);
00141                         iIsAttached = EFalse;
00142                         }
00143                 break;
00144                                 
00145        default:
00146             {
00147             // Check first that we really want to execute KAiwCmdHelp. By this 
00148             // way we can set up the generic param list only if necessary.
00149             TInt aiwCmd = iServiceHandler->ServiceCmdByMenuCmd( aCommand );
00150             if ( aiwCmd == KAiwCmdHelp )
00151                 {
00152                 // First set up help context parameters.
00153                 CAiwGenericParamList& inParamList = SetupGenericParamListL();
00154             
00155                 // Execute AIW service command.
00156                 iServiceHandler->ExecuteMenuCmdL(
00157                     aCommand,
00158                     inParamList,
00159                     iServiceHandler->OutParamListL());             
00160                 }
00161             break;
00162             }
00163         }
00164     }
00165 // -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00166 //  CAIWConsumerBasicsAppUi::HandleStatusPaneSizeChange()
00167 //  Called by the framework when the application status pane
00168 //  size is changed. Passes the new client rectangle to the AppView
00169 // -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00170 //
00171 void CAIWConsumerBasicsAppUi::HandleStatusPaneSizeChange()
00172     {
00173     iAppView->SetRect( ClientRect() );
00174     } 
00175     
00176 // -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00177 //  CAIWConsumerBasicsAppUi::SetupGenericParamListL()
00178 //  
00179 // -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00180 //
00181 CAiwGenericParamList& CAIWConsumerBasicsAppUi::SetupGenericParamListL() const
00182     {
00183     CArrayFix<TCoeHelpContext>* buf = iCoeEnv->AppUi()->AppHelpContextL();
00184     TCoeHelpContext& helpContext = buf->At(0);      
00185     
00186     // Set help context UID.
00187     TAiwVariant uidVariant;
00188     uidVariant.Set(helpContext.iMajor);         
00189     TAiwGenericParam uidParam(EGenericParamHelpItem, uidVariant);       
00190 
00191     // Set help context name.
00192     TAiwVariant contextVariant;         
00193     contextVariant.Set(helpContext.iContext);       
00194     TAiwGenericParam contextParam(EGenericParamHelpItem, contextVariant);   
00195     
00196     // Append parameters to input parameter list.
00197     CAiwGenericParamList& inParamList = iServiceHandler->InParamListL();
00198     inParamList.AppendL(uidParam);
00199     inParamList.AppendL(contextParam);
00200     
00201     delete buf;
00202     buf = NULL;             
00203     
00204     return inParamList;         
00205     }
00206 
00207 // -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00208 //  CAIWConsumerBasicsAppUi::IsAttached()
00209 //  
00210 // -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00211 //    
00212 TBool CAIWConsumerBasicsAppUi::IsAttached() const
00213     {
00214     return iIsAttached;
00215     }
00216 
00217 // -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00218 //  CAIWConsumerBasicsAppUi::NumberOfProviders()
00219 //  
00220 // -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00221 //
00222 TInt CAIWConsumerBasicsAppUi::NumberOfProviders() const
00223     {
00224     TInt providerCount = 0;
00225     
00226     // Construct a criteria item object. A criteria item contains following fields:
00227     // - Criteria Id        <Value must be set>
00228     // - Service command    <Value must be set>
00229     // - Content type       <Value must be set>
00230     // - Service class      <Value must be set>
00231     // - Default provider   <Default value can be used>
00232     // - Max providers      <Default value can be used>
00233     // - Options            <Default value can be used>
00234     CAiwCriteriaItem* criteria = CAiwCriteriaItem::NewLC(
00235         EAIWConsumerBasicsHelpPlaceholder, 
00236         KAiwCmdHelp, 
00237         KContentTypeAll);
00238 
00239     criteria->SetServiceClass(TUid::Uid(KAiwClassMenu));
00240 
00241     // Query the number of providers. All fields of criteria item much match to
00242     // the criteria item defined in the resource file and used in AttachMenuL().
00243     providerCount = iServiceHandler->NbrOfProviders(criteria);
00244     
00245     CleanupStack::PopAndDestroy(criteria);
00246     return providerCount;
00247     }
